description.value:
This sticky salve stubbornly holds wounds closed and encourages swift natural healing. You can activate the salve in either of the following ways.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Administer First Aid] without requiring @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Healer's Toolkit]. You either gain a +2 item bonus to the Medicine check, or you can use the skinstitch salve's Medicine modifier of [[/r 1d20+13]] instead of your own.

Activate F Interact

Trigger You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds] or use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Battle Medicine]

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to the triggering Medicine check. If you roll a success on the Medicine check, you get a critical success instead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Skinstitch Salve]
